text: Donna Karan (born October 2, 1951) is an American fashion designer and the creator of the Donna Karan New York and DKNY clothing labels. ==Early life== She was born in Forest Hills, Queens, New York City. She is Jewish. Category:American fashion designers Category:American Jews Category:Businesspeople from New York City Category:1951 births Category:Living people
title: Donna Karan
